post.title: Contracting
post.intro:
Software/Web Systems Developer and Consultant

I am so glad to have met the people at IBNR Systems. When I started I quickly found that what I knew about software development was only the tip of the iceberg. I have definitely made friends for life. I got to develop solutions for insurance, survey and financial data mining projects.

card.content: What an experience. Thank you for the years of great moments.

image.alt: Adding up the costs showind an incorrect sum 1 + 1 = 3.

content.alt: Terence attending a conference with a work colleague

content.content:
Some of my responsibilities included:

  • Research into development projects and solutions

  • Project estimates. Time frame and risk analysis

  • Project planning and management

  • Writing Unit tests and Type Mock. (Test driven development)

  • Solution Implementation, development of the solution using the latest and most accurate development resources.

  • Source control.

  • Continuous integration

Experience Gained:

  • 2+ years Design and Development experience in:

    Languages:

    • VB .NET

    • C# .NET

    • ASP .NET

    • SQL

    • XML

    Programs

    • VB .NET 2005 / 2008

    • C# .NET 2005 / 2008

    • ASP .NET 2005 / 2008

    • SQL Server 2000 / 2005

    • Nant

    • MS Build

    • Codesmith

    • WIX

    • Developer Express Control Suite

    • Developer Express Code Rush

    • Developer Express Refactor

    • Active Reports

    • Crystal Reports

    • Subversion

    • CVS

  • Managing projects and resources to complete projects in a timely fashion

  • Using source control to keep track of changes and allowing large groups of developers to work on the same project.

  • Setting up and maintaining the “Continuous Integration” process
